name: RPC, Inc.
description: RPC, Inc. is a leading provider of oilfield services and equipment in the energy sector. Established in 1984, the company specializes in pressure pumping services and other support services for the oil and natural gas industry. RPC operates through various subsidiaries, including Cudd Energy Services and other divisions, which together offer a comprehensive range of services designed to enhance the efficiency and productivity of exploration and production activities. The company's primary services include hydraulic fracturing, cementing, coiled tubing, and other specialized services that are critical for the successful development of oil and gas resources. With a focus on innovation and safety, RPC is committed to delivering high-quality services that meet the evolving needs of its clients in a dynamic energy landscape. The company operates primarily in the United States and has established a reputation for reliability and excellence in service delivery. As the energy industry continues to shift towards sustainable practices, RPC is exploring opportunities to integrate more environmentally friendly technologies into its service offerings, positioning itself as a forward-thinking player in the oilfield services market.
ceo: Ben A. J. W. H. M. P. Van De Wetering

key_executives.name: Ben A. J. W. H. M. P. Van De Wetering
Richard A. H. L. S. H. M. P. Van De Wetering

seo.meta_title: RPC, Inc. | Leading Oilfield Services Provider
seo.meta_description: Learn about RPC, Inc., a top provider of oilfield services and equipment. Discover our innovative solutions and commitment to the energy sector.

faq.question: What services does RPC provide?
faq.answer: RPC provides oilfield services including hydraulic fracturing, cementing, and coiled tubing.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of RPC?
faq.answer: Ben A. J. W. H. M. P. Van De Wetering is the CEO of RPC, Inc.

faq.question: Where is RPC headquartered?
faq.answer: RPC is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
